list_definition.definition: a strong personal quality that makes someone attract, influence, and inspire other people

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He lacked the charisma required to become an effective political leader.

list_ex_of_english: It is difficult to divorce perceptions of policy reform from the political charisma of proponents.
